data.title: Phillip Goodhand-Tait Oceans Away UK Vinyl LP
data.meta_description: PHILLIP GOODHAND-TAIT Oceans Away (1976 UK 10-track vinyl LP. The fifth solo album release from the English singer-songwriter and musician, including the title track which was later covered by Roger Daltrey. The picture sleeve has the lyrics printed on the back and shows just a little mild edge / corner wear and the vinyl still looks barely played CHR1113) Tracklisting & Info:A1. Oceans Away 3:46A2. PHILLIP GOODHAND-TAIT Oceans Away (1976 UK 10-track vinyl LP. The fifth solo album release from the English singer-songwriter and musician, including the title track which was later covered by Roger Daltrey. The picture sleeve has the lyrics printed on the back and shows just a little mild edge / corner wear and the vinyl still looks barely played CHR1113)

B2. You've Got The Gun 4:17

B3. Laundry 3:15

B4. Gabrielle 2:36

B5. Can You Demonstrate 3:25
